attributes.action: Make a clean break 'No Deal' Brexit on the 31st October 2019.
attributes.additional_details: There is  o background evidence as this is unprecedented and therefore we will create the evidence as we go. Sure it is an unknown but have some faith that we can prosper.
attributes.background: The majority voted to leave the EU in the 2016 referendum. Respect the vote and ensure we leave even without a deal as it will not be catastrophic.
